content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg, let me start with a somewhat elevated figure of 1250 Euros per month. I'm confident this exceptional location and modern amenities warrant such a price. Keep in mind we can negotiate further if needed.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price proposal, Mr. Schmidt. However, considering my student status and pursuit of an affordable living arrangement, I find 1250 Euros to be quite high for this apartment. I would like to explore lower options within your flexibility.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your situation as a student, but let me clarify that my apartment is in high demand due to its prime location and features. To accommodate you slightly, I can lower the price to 1200 Euros per month, but this remains my final concession. I hope you find this offer acceptable, Maryam. If not, I don't want to continue the negotiation, as I must protect my property's value.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While appreciating your efforts to meet my needs somewhat, Mr. Schmidt, I still find the proposed 1200 Euros to be on the expensive side given my financial situation as a student. If you cannot lower the price further, I don't want to continue the negotiation due to the significant difference in our expectations. Thank you for your time. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
